description.raw:
Some of them:

* Do not use std::toupper
* Use LoadLib instead of LoadLibrary to make Windows happy

    * See [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-plugin/pull-requests/21](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-plugin/pull-requests/21)
    
* Add aliases for popen/pclose
* Missing libraries to link
* Do not use PrintWindowsSystemWarning since it is not expored in common

The whole family of fixes is being tested here:

* [https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ign\_gui-pr-win/12/console](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ign_gui-pr-win/12/console)

~~There are still some linking failures that are probably trivial under the somebody else eyes but gave some headaches on Friday:~~  Yes, they were trivial: [244b0d5](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/commits/244b0d5e17bc0d74e34e730c53039693919ba034)
description.html:
Some of them:

  • Do not use std::toupper

  • Use LoadLib instead of LoadLibrary to make Windows happy

    • See #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-plugin/pull-requests/21

  • Add aliases for popen/pclose

  • Missing libraries to link
  • Do not use PrintWindowsSystemWarning since it is not expored in common

The whole family of fixes is being tested here:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ign_gui-pr-win/12/console

There are still some linking failures that are probably trivial under the somebody else eyes but gave some headaches on Friday: Yes, they were trivial: 244b0d5
